long description: PV-666 BSNL SIXER: Unlimited data (Speed reduced to 80 Kbps after 2GB/day) + Unlimited voice calls for 60 days. -- After 60 days: ALL calls (Local/STD) (On-net/Off-net) @ 50 Paisa/Minute -- SMS (while in Home & National Roaming): Local @25 Paisa/SMS, National @35 Paisa/SMS -- All other charges As per Per Minute plan
